men.title: Hombres
men.description: Ejemplos para elegir el look ideal.

cards.title: Traje oscuro
cards.description: Negro, gris o azul muy oscuro con camisa clara.

cards.title: Traje azul marino
cards.description: Una opcion clasica y elegante para fotos.

cards.title: Zapatos formales
cards.description: Mocasines o zapatos de vestir en tonos neutros.

cards.title: Camisa clara
cards.description: Blanca o azul clara para un look limpio.

cards.title: Corbata opcional
cards.description: Un toque elegante si quieres elevar el look.

pinkSection.title: Elegante y comodo
pinkSection.description: Un look sobrio siempre funciona. Busca telas que se vean bien en fotos y que te permitan moverte con confianza.

women.title: Mujeres
women.description: Ideas para un look comodo y elegante.

cards.title: Vestido coctel
cards.description: Largo a la rodilla o ligeramente arriba.

cards.title: Vestido midi
cards.description: Tonos suaves y telas con movimiento.

cards.title: Accesorios sutiles
cards.description: Toques elegantes sin sobrecargar el look.

cards.title: Zapatos comodos
cards.description: Tacones o flats que puedas usar toda la noche.

cards.title: Chal ligero
cards.description: Ideal si refresca al final de la fiesta.

pinkSection.title: Listas para brillar
pinkSection.description: Elige un look que te haga sentir segura y comoda. Tonos suaves y telas fluidas se ven increibles en fotos.

colors.title: Colores reservados
colors.sectionSubtitle: Ayudanos a respetar el look del cortejo

cards.title: Blanco y marfil
cards.description: Reservados para la novia y el cortejo.

cards.title: Dorado y rose gold
cards.description: Evitalos para mantener la paleta del evento.

cards.title: Tonos similares
cards.description: Evita variaciones que parezcan parte del cortejo.

cards.title: Beige y crema
cards.description: Si se ven muy claros, mejor evitar.

cards.title: Metales brillantes
cards.description: Evita tonos metalicos que compitan con el cortejo.

pinkSection.title: Cuidemos la paleta
pinkSection.description: Evitar estos tonos nos ayuda a mantener la armonia del evento. Si tienes dudas, preguntanos.

cards.title: Abrigo ligero
cards.description: Puede refrescar por la noche, trae algo suave.

cards.title: Comodidad
cards.description: Busca telas que te permitan moverte y bailar.

cards.title: Listo para fotos
cards.description: Un look limpio y planchado siempre luce bien.

cards.title: Clima fresco
cards.description: Trae algo ligero para la tarde y noche.

cards.title: Detalles pulidos
cards.description: Peinado y accesorios simples elevan el look.

pinkSection.title: Pequenos detalles
pinkSection.description: Un abrigo ligero, zapatos comodos y un look pulido hacen la diferencia. Queremos que disfrutes todo el dia.

men.title: Men
men.description: Examples to help you choose the right look.

cards.title: Dark suit
cards.description: Black, charcoal, or deep navy with a light shirt.

cards.title: Navy suit
cards.description: A classic, elegant option for photos.

cards.title: Dress shoes
cards.description: Loafers or formal shoes in neutral tones.

cards.title: Light shirt
cards.description: White or light blue for a clean look.

cards.title: Optional tie
cards.description: A polished touch if you want to elevate the look.

pinkSection.title: Clean and sharp
pinkSection.description: A simple, tailored look always works. Choose fabrics that look great in photos and feel good all day.

women.title: Women
women.description: Ideas for a comfortable and elegant look.

cards.title: Cocktail dress
cards.description: Knee length or slightly above.

cards.title: Midi dress
cards.description: Soft tones and flowy fabrics.

cards.title: Subtle accessories
cards.description: Elegant touches without overdoing it.

cards.title: Comfortable shoes
cards.description: Heels or flats you can wear all night.

cards.title: Light shawl
cards.description: Perfect if the evening gets chilly.

pinkSection.title: Feel your best
pinkSection.description: Pick a look that feels confident and comfortable. Soft tones and flowing fabrics look amazing in photos.

colors.title: Reserved colors
colors.sectionSubtitle: Help us keep the wedding party look

cards.title: White and ivory
cards.description: Reserved for the bride and wedding party.

cards.title: Gold and rose gold
cards.description: Avoid these to keep the event palette.

cards.title: Similar tones
cards.description: Avoid shades that could look like the wedding party.

cards.title: Beige and cream
cards.description: If it reads too light, it is best to avoid it.

cards.title: Metallics
cards.description: Skip metallic tones that compete with the wedding party.

pinkSection.title: Keep the palette
pinkSection.description: Avoiding these tones helps keep the event look cohesive. If unsure, ask us.

cards.title: Light coat
cards.description: Evenings can be chilly, bring a light layer.

cards.title: Comfort
cards.description: Choose fabrics that let you move and dance.

cards.title: Photo ready
cards.description: A clean, pressed look always works.

cards.title: Cool weather
cards.description: Bring a light layer for late afternoon.

cards.title: Polished details
cards.description: Simple, neat touches elevate the look.

pinkSection.title: Small touches matter
pinkSection.description: A light coat, comfortable shoes, and a polished look make the day easier and better in photos.
